actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Ocala, Florida, as the "Golden-Collum Memorial Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal Building and U.S. Courthouse in Ocala, Florida, as the Golden-Collum Memorial Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Ocala, Florida, as the "Golden-Collum Memorial Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
